text: Tom Devriendt (born 29 October 1991) is a Belgian professional racing cyclist, who currently rides for UCI ProTeam . ==Major results== ;2011 : 1st Dwars door de Antwerpse Kempen ;2013 : 3rd Grote Prijs Stad Geel ;2014 : 3rd Omloop van het Waasland ;2015 : 3rd Grand Prix Pino Cerami ;2016 : 6th Eschborn-Frankfurt – Rund um den Finanzplatz : 8th Overall Tour de Picardie ;2017 : 1st Omloop van het Houtland : 3rd Binche–Chimay–Binche : 7th Paris–Bourges ;2018 : 7th Great War Remembrance Race ;2019 : 1st Stage 2 Tour of Austria : 5th Grote Prijs Stad Zottegem ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian male cyclists Category:People from Veurne Category:Sportspeople from West Flanders
title: Tom Devriendt
